snippet: The Chicago Cubs won the bidding for the Jorge Soler, agreeing to a nine-year, $30 million contract. The 20-year-old Cuban outfielder is expected to beef up Chicago’s minor league system.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Chicago Cubs win the bidding for the Cuban outfielder Jorge Soler, agreeing to a nine-year, $30 million contract; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs won the bidding for the Jorge Soler, agreeing to a nine-year, $30 million contract. The 20-year-old Cuban outfielder is expected to beef up Chicago’s minor league system.

headline.print_headline: Cubs Are Said To Win Rights To Cuban
headline.seo: Cubs Outbid Rivals to Sign Cuban Slugger Jorge Soler
headline.main: Cubs Outbid Rivals to Sign Cuban Slugger
